body.name: Furologee White Gaming Desk with Charging Station and LED Lights, 55" Office Computer Desk with Reversible Shelves and Fabric Drawer, Study Table with Monitor Stand and 2 Hooks for Home Office
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 20 hrs 33 mins
features: [Gaming Desk with LED Lights]: White desk is equipped with a built-in RGB LED lights strips, the 55" large computer desk provides 20 adjustable colors, 22 dynamic modes, 5 adjustable brightness levels, and 10 flicker frequencies which meet your different work or game scenarios.

[Large Desk with Charging Station]: The gaming desk includes a built-in 2 power outlets and 2 USB charging ports for your phone, headset, and other office or gaming devices with fast charging, which provides a great convenience to your life when you are working or playing games. Make the desktop look clean and tidy.

[Desk with Drawer and Monitor Stand]: The office desk with a movable FABRIC drawer provides additional space for storing your personal items; 2 side hooks can hold your headphones, backpack, etc. to fully utilize available space and keep your desk tidy. 35.4"*6.7" monitor stand maks you have ergonomic line of sight levels that help reduce neck fatigue through better sitting posture.

[Reversible and Adjustable Shelf]: The white computer desk with 2 storage shelves which can be fix on the left or right side of the desk according to your preferences; The middle board of the shelf is flexible, you can install it on the the upper/middle hole of the shelf, or remove it to store the large items, meet your different usage needs.

[Comfortable and Sturdy Desk]: The size of the white officer desk is 55.1"L*18.9"D*29.5"H; The home office desk is made from strong metal frame and durable E1 particleboard to ensure its strength and durability, which is waterproof and anti-scratch, very easy to clean; the inner metal bar can support your feet, allowing you to maintain a comfortable state when working; 4 adjustable foot ensure floor protection and stability, even on uneven surfaces.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Charging Station 2 Monitor Stand 3 Reversible Shelves

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: It came well packaged, nothing missing or broken. There are a few minor cosmetic issues in the paint around the edges of the boards but you can barely tell. The holes for the outlet cover weren't drilled but it sits down fine and is easy enough to fix if I ever need to screw it down. Overall its great for the money I paid, no missing or broken parts, and very sturdy. Comes with detailed instructions and everything needed for assembly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: came with easy to follow instructions for assembly , nice and sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bought as a gaming desk for my 12 yr old son
reviews.reviewText: The desk is aesthetically pleasing, but could be a little more sturdy, it does work great for what we paid! And holds all of this gaming equipment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for left or right handed people
reviews.reviewText: Setup took a while but it was very easy. It could probably be done alone but one extra pair of hands will help a lot. Instructions were easy to follow. Desk is very sturdy. The lights are perfect and can be adjusted by brightness, pattern and color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I want to love this desk, but it has WAY to many issues
reviews.reviewText: I cannot tell you how many hours ive spent building, fixing and even trying to DIY remodel the whole desk because I lost track, hell I wouldn't be surprised if tomorrow i do it all again... againThe instructions are okaaayyyy they arent terrible but arent the best either it also isnt easy to assemble on your own you could possibly do it by yourself but if it took me 2 - 3 hours (just the first attempt) to build it with help then I can only imagine solo.Once the desk is complete I dont know if I got a faulty model or something but oh my god it is the wobbliest thing I have ever seen, I notice other reviews saying things like "really sturdy, can support an entire setup, very sturdy almost no wobble" So I figured that I did something wrong which commence my 4 day struggle of rearranging, rebuilding and customizingI have tried everything from adding more supports to even removing some unnecessary parts to rebuilding the whole damn thing from square one I refused to blame the desk when others said it was perfect... but no matter how i tried the wobble stayed I manage to bring it down by a lot but enouigh to where I dont fear my monitor falling down

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This desk is amazing! It was easy to set up and lights are vibrant and beautiful! Fits perfectly beside my bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ABSOLUTE BANG FOR YOUR BUCK
reviews.reviewText: A little bit difficult to put together, other than that, it is very sturdy and made of good material and is an absolute bang for your buck!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Wiggly Wobbly Crap
reviews.reviewText: I fell in love with the look of the desk and made the plunge based on reviews from other buyers saying that it would be an easy, sturdy build that could handle holding a gaming PC and monitor.Those reviews couldn't have been bigger lies...This desk was a nightmare to assemble, even for my literal engineer boyfriend who was cursing up a storm over one screw. The table top was damaged, a screw port was pulled out, and the frame bent with the slightest pressure.Once the thing was built, I attempted to do a little typing on my laptop, but the desk wobbled so much that I actual got motion sick and had to move to the dining room table. I can't imagine trusting this desk to hold a PC.I'm now awaiting my refund (which I better receive in full after all that crap...) and don't get me started on what it takes to pack up and return this desk...SAVE YOURSELF THE TROUBLE AND DON'T PURCHASE IN THE FIRST PLACE.
